attributes.action: Force site traffic from the former Terry's site on Bishopthorpe Road, York to take an alternative route which at no point enters Bishopthorpe, York
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Force site traffic from the former Terry's site on Bishopthorpe Road, York to take an alternative route which at no point enters Bishopthorpe, York

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
